custom_nodes.title: Download Tools for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Comprehensive media downloading and web scraping nodes for ComfyUI. Download from 1000+ websites including Instagram, Reddit, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok using gallery-dl, yt-dlp, and advanced web scraping. Features: Gallery-dl downloader (100+ sites), Yt-dlp downloader (1000+ platforms), Web Image Scraper with 15+ site-specific handlers, browser cookie authentication, MCP integration for Claude Desktop.
custom_nodes.author: Eric Hiss (EricRollei)
akawana
custom_nodes.title: Keybinding Extra
custom_nodes.description: Adds shortcuts for commenting and deleting lines of text, with a configurable comment symbol. Includes a node that cleans comments from text and splits content using tags for Regional Prompting.

custom_nodes.author: turisc
custom_nodes.title: Text Line Selector
custom_nodes.description: Extracts a single line from multiline string. Useful for batch processing

custom_nodes.author: FuryNocturnTV
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Studio-Fury
custom_nodes.description: Nodos custom, al estilo fury, nodos que añaden versatilidad. con el tiempo ira creciendo los nodos.

custom_nodes.author: granddyser
custom_nodes.title: Wan-video-extender
custom_nodes.description: Wan Video Extender extends a short video or a single image into a longer, temporally consistent clip using a VACE based control latent. It runs in multiple extension loops. Each loop can have its own prompt and optional LoRA, so you can evolve the scene step by step without rebuilding the graph.

custom_nodes.author: Icekiub
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IcyHider
custom_nodes.description: A custom node extension that hides image previews until you hover over the node.

custom_nodes.author: pznodes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SAM3DBody
custom_nodes.description: SAM 3D Body integration for ComfyUI - Robust full-body human mesh recovery from single images. Reconstruct 3D human meshes with pose, shape, and hand details. First draft, please open a github issue if you have any problems or feature requests :)

custom_nodes.author: danielpflorian
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WorkflowGenerator
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-WorkflowGenerator custom nodes for generating ComfyUI workflows from natural language

custom_nodes.author: EricRollei
custom_nodes.title: PDF Tools - Advanced PDF Processing & OCR
custom_nodes.description: Advanced PDF processing, OCR, Image and text parsing, smart image crop nodes for ComfyUI. Features include multi-language OCR (Surya, PaddleOCR VL), AI vision analysis (Florence-2, LayoutLMv3), advanced PDF extraction with quality assessment, spread detection for scanned books, and comprehensive layout analysis. Supports 90+ languages with multiple output formats.

custom_nodes.author: EricRollei
custom_nodes.title: AAA Metadata System
custom_nodes.description: Advanced metadata management and multi-format image save system for ComfyUI. Save/load with metadata for PNG, JPEG, TIFF, PSD (with layers), SVG, and WebP. Features XMP/TXT/JSON sidecar files, embedded EXIF/XMP, MWG-RS regions for face metadata, workflow tracking, LoRA/embedding detection, runtime execution hooks, and Automatic1111 compatibility. Preserve layers, alpha channels, and complete provenance across all formats.

custom_nodes.author: EricRollei
custom_nodes.title: HYPIR Image Restoration for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI nodes for HYPIR image restoration using Stable Diffusion 2.1. Restores and upscales scanned or generated images with optional LM Studio prompt enhancement and tiled VAE processing for large resolutions.

custom_nodes.author: Madiator2011
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI RunpodDirect
custom_nodes.description: Direct model downloads to your Runod pod with blazing-fast multi-connection support. No more downloading models to your local machine and re-uploading!

custom_nodes.author: Writili
custom_nodes.title: WtlNodes
custom_nodes.description: This node adds improvement over some already existing nodes as well as some custom nodes.

custom_nodes.author: yuanyuan-spec
custom_nodes.title: HunyuanVideo-1.5 nodes
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI plugin based on HunyuanVideo-1.5, offering both simplified and complete node sets for quick usage or deep workflow customization.

custom_nodes.author: rookiestar28
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Text Processor
custom_nodes.description: An advanced text processing node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: kjqwer
custom_nodes.title: SmartSaveImage
custom_nodes.description: Smart Image Saving Nodes - Offers intelligent folder management and image saving capabilities, supporting flexible folder hierarchy control, multiple metadata sources, various image formats, and metadata embedding. It includes two nodes: SmartFolderManager and SmartImageSaver.

custom_nodes.author: EricRollei
custom_nodes.title: AAA_Metadata_System
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive metadata management system for ComfyUI that enables storing, retrieving, and manipulating image metadata across multiple formats including embedded files, XMP sidecars, text files, and SQLite databases.

custom_nodes.author: Ltamann
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TBG-SAM3
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node extension integrating Meta's Segment Anything Model 3 (SAM 3) for advanced image and video segmentation with text-prompt, point-based, and mask-driven capabilities. Provides production-ready nodes compatible with ComfyUI's Impact Pack SEGS format, depth map generation, and support for Python 3.13+ with CUDA and CPU support.

custom_nodes.author: hobinrude
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DWposeDeluxe
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node integrating DW-Pose (Denoising Whole-Body Pose Estimation) for high-quality pose detection with CPU (ONNX) and GPU (TensorRT) support. Features 20x faster performance with TensorRT acceleration, automatic model downloading, customizable pose visualization, keypoint conversion, and video workflow integration.

custom_nodes.author: sbcode
custom_nodes.title: Remove Background
custom_nodes.description: Remove background scenery from an image of a person. The output image is saved as an RGBA PNG. The alpha channel is included.

custom_nodes.author: wouterverweirder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI SAM3
custom_nodes.description: Custom Nodes to work with SAM3

custom_nodes.author: Hearmeman24
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LoRAPlotNode
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for testing multiple LoRA models across different strength values. Automatically generates model/clip pairs for each LoRA-strength combination and includes an image saver node with text overlay for easy identification.

custom_nodes.author: PozzettiAndrea
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SAM3
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI integration for Meta's SAM3 model enabling open-vocabulary image segmentation using natural language text prompts, with automatic model download, geometric refinement, and flexible confidence thresholds.

custom_nodes.author: wwzhifeng
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-jsonprompt
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI node that expands structured JSON text into standard prompts for use with models like Gemini, Flux, OpenAI, and Sora. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: StarIICraft
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Simple-Selector
custom_nodes.description: Logic control node with 5 universal input ports that checks connections in reverse priority order and outputs the index of the first valid active input, with support for muted nodes and any data type.

custom_nodes.author: fr0nky0ng
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-JSON-Prompt
custom_nodes.description: Custom node for ComfyUI that generates JSON prompts from natural language descriptions to improve text-to-image generation quality. Supports local LLM integration via Ollama or Google Gemini API.

custom_nodes.author: EricRollei
custom_nodes.title: Eric_Image_Processing_Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive collection of advanced image processing nodes for ComfyUI, featuring state-of-the-art denoising, enhancement, and restoration techniques with GPU acceleration and specialized film grain processing.

custom_nodes.author: huyl3-cpu
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-huyl2-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom utility nodes for ComfyUI by huyl2 (sort list v2, etc.)

custom_nodes.author: 7BEII
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-PD_comfy-api-node
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node suite integrating multiple AI image generation APIs (Gemini, Flux.1 Kontext Pro) with unified authentication via ComfyUI API Key and real-time cost tracking. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: wallen0322
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AE-Animation
custom_nodes.description: After Effects-style animation nodes for ComfyUI with timeline-based keyframe control, layer management, and real-time preview rendering. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: wallen0322
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TTM-WAN22
custom_nodes.description: TTM (Time-to-Move) node for ComfyUI enabling motion-controlled video generation with Wan2.2 models using dual-clock denoising for independent background and object animation control.

custom_nodes.author: swan7-py
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ImageAlphaCrop
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI plugin for automatically cropping transparent alpha channel borders from images - ideal for processing logos and icons. Supports batch processing with adjustable padding and alpha threshold. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: was
custom_nodes.title: WAS LMStudio Easy-Query
custom_nodes.description: LM Studio calls with image support and easy task directions.

custom_nodes.author: PozzettiAndrea
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AnyTop
custom_nodes.description: Standalone ComfyUI custom nodes for AnyTop - Universal Motion Generation for Any Skeleton Topology.

custom_nodes.author: IamCreateAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Animon
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for [Animon Platform](https://platform.animon.ai/), a comprehensive API service offering a variety of image and video generation models.

custom_nodes.author: neonr0
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PixelConstrainedScaler
custom_nodes.description: Smart upscaling with pixel-budget awareness while preserving native aspect ratios. Ideal for Image to Image (I2I) and Image to Video (I2V) workflows!

custom_nodes.author: slahiri
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AI-Photography-Toolkit
custom_nodes.description: A collection of AI-powered photography and image generation tools for ComfyUI, featuring the SID_AIPromptGenerator node that uses Anthropic's Claude API to analyze images and generate optimized prompts for various image generation models.

custom_nodes.author: wzyfromhust
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SAM2UltraV2
custom_nodes.description: A fully modular and high-performance implementation of SAM2 (Segment Anything Model 2) for ComfyUI with dual-prompt support, negative point sampling, and upper body segmentation.

custom_nodes.author: cedarconnor
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DreamCube
custom_nodes.description: 360° panoramic depth estimation with multi-plane synchronization for ComfyUI, featuring equirectangular-cubemap transformations, cross-face consistency, and boundary blending for seamless depth maps.

custom_nodes.author: dowa-git
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-dowa
custom_nodes.description: Professional navigation bar widget for ComfyUI with JWT-based user authentication, workflow templates, and team collaboration features in a purple gradient design.

custom_nodes.author: fuselayer
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-lite-tracker
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for LiteTracker, a fast and efficient point tracking model for videos with load model, track, and grid editor nodes.

custom_nodes.author: yichengup
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-YCNodes_Toolkit
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI toolkit with custom nodes for BBox canvas visualization, image brush mask drawing, and coordinate annotation for debugging and external data bridging. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: hua1995116
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_goenhance_ffmpeg_wm
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for adding watermarks to videos using FFmpeg, with configurable position, opacity, scale, and hardware acceleration support.

custom_nodes.author: EricRollei
custom_nodes.title: Comfy_HunyuanImage3
custom_nodes.description: Professional ComfyUI custom nodes for Tencent's HunyuanImage-3.0 80B multimodal model, with multiple loading modes, smart memory management, large image generation with CPU offload, and optional prompt enhancement via LLM APIs.

custom_nodes.author: Devin Garner
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Make-It-Animatable
custom_nodes.description: Auto-Rigging humanoid 3D meshes for Mixamo animations

custom_nodes.author: alexjx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-XJNodes
custom_nodes.description: A modular collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI, organized by data type for easy navigation and maintenance.

custom_nodes.author: princepainter
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-PainterSampler
custom_nodes.description: A dual-model image-to-video sampler for ComfyUI that combines high-noise and low-noise models in a single node, replacing two KSamplerAdvanced nodes with zero overhead and bit-identical frame generation. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: comrender
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Nano-Banana-Resizer
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that automatically calculates optimal output dimensions for Google's Nano Banana image editing model, supporting 22 aspect ratio buckets and ensuring pixel-perfect outputs without shifting or cropping.

custom_nodes.author: hum-ma
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TiledVaeLite
custom_nodes.description: A faster tiled VAE decode node for ComfyUI based on LTXV, optimized for low VRAM scenarios with configurable tiling, progress bars, and improved logging for decoding large images and videos.

custom_nodes.author: tristanvdb
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-toolset
custom_nodes.description: Human-in-the-loop image selection tool for ComfyUI workflows using a Flask web server, enabling users to pause workflows and interactively select images via a web browser interface.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DyPE
custom_nodes.description: DyPE: Dynamic Position Extrapolation for Ultra High Resolution Diffusion ,you can use a wrapper node it in comfyUI

custom_nodes.author: ailab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FlashVSR
custom_nodes.description: Powerful ComfyUI custom node built on the FlashVSR model, facilitating real-time diffusion-based video super-resolution for streaming applications.

custom_nodes.author: shammi-g
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Simple_Readable_Metadata-SG
custom_nodes.description: View Image Metadata of ComfyUI as well as of ForgeUI or Automatic 1111 generated images in Easily Readable Format

custom_nodes.author: mister_link
custom_nodes.title: Link Comfy Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom ComfyUI nodes by Mister-Link, including color parsing, frame calculation, and utility nodes for enhanced workflow capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: jonstreeter
custom_nodes.title: Reference-Based Video Colorization
custom_nodes.description: Dual implementation of reference-based video colorization featuring ColorMNet (2024) with DINOv2 and Deep Exemplar (2019). Includes 4 nodes (2 video, 2 image), multiple feature encoders (VGG19, DINOv2, CLIP), advanced post-processing (color-matcher, WLS, guided, bilateral), and auto-installer for dependencies.

custom_nodes.author: comrender
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Topaz-Upscaler
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates the Topaz Labs API for AI-powered image upscaling and enhancement.

custom_nodes.author: Fablestarexpanse
custom_nodes.title: Timer-Node-Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that displays live processing time in a red digital countdown clock format, perfect for monitoring image generation times and tracking performance between workflow nodes.

custom_nodes.author: liming123332
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Ranbooru
custom_nodes.description: Custom node that migrates WebUI Forge's Ranbooru plugin to ComfyUI, enabling searches across Booru sites to generate positive/negative prompts with tag cleaning, rating sorting, and caching support. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: SilentZhang
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-encrypt
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for RSA image encryption using asymmetric cryptography with key generation, encryption, and decryption functions via the cryptography library. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: pznodes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DepthAnythingV3
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes to use Depth Anything V3 - the latest depth estimation model from ByteDance. For now monocular depth, camera pose estimation and 3D point clouds/gaussians are supported. Models autodownload from HuggingFace (depth-anything org). This is a first draft, let me know if you have any feedback! :)

custom_nodes.author: Koratahiu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-OFTv2
custom_nodes.description: A custom node to support and load OFTv2 adapters

custom_nodes.author: GeekatplayStudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Text2Speech
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for text-to-speech integration with a local TTS server.

custom_nodes.author: alankent
custom_nodes.title: OA 360 Clip
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node for extracting perspective views from 360 degree equirectangular images with an interactive drag-and-drop crop interface.

custom_nodes.author: GraftingRayman
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Visual Dimension Selector
custom_nodes.description: A visual ComfyUI latent canvas dimensions selector

custom_nodes.author: alludus
custom_nodes.title: multiGPU Upscaler
custom_nodes.description: multiGPU batch-parallel upscaling nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Koratahiu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Diff2Flow
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial Implementation of Diff2Flow Method for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: GraftingRayman
custom_nodes.title: Unfied Vision Prompt Generator
custom_nodes.description: A Qwen 2/2.5, Moondream and SmolVLM LLM caption/prompt genrator

custom_nodes.author: GraftingRayman
custom_nodes.title: Border Distance Mapper
custom_nodes.description: A Countries Border distance mapper

custom_nodes.author: jianghong-zhu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AdvancedCameraPrompts
custom_nodes.description: Advanced camera control prompt generator for ComfyUI that reads camera information from 3D nodes and generates precise, professional camera control prompts.

custom_nodes.author: ahkimkoo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GetKeyFrames
custom_nodes.description: Extract keyframes from video

custom_nodes.author: power88
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PDiD-LLM-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A LLM node with some models. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: deng-wei
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MiVolo-V2
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for [MiVolo V2 Age & Gender Prediction](https://huggingface.co/iitolstykh/mivolo_v2)
